stories.text:
I'm not a recruiter, and I deleted my LinkedIn account over 15 years ago, and found I have never needed it. If someone asks me for my LinkedIn, I give my email address instead. This works quite well.

What would happen if you deleted your LinkedIn account?
stories.title: Why do you need LinkedIn? (non-recruiters)

stories.text:
Moochee is an interactive quiz game for teams. One person starts a game on Mobile/PC as host, the other people can join by scanning the QR code with mobile camera as players. We can easily supporting 100+ people playing in one game.

It was built by two of us during pandemic. We have the need to run online quiz game but the commercial solution like Kahoot! is too pricy and only support 20-50 players in their affordable plans.

There are 2 options to experience it:

- Try Out[1]: no log in required, you can host/play existing fun quizzes and create public quizzes

- Sign In[2]: log in with gmail, and then you can create private quizzes.

[1]: https://moochee-app.fly.dev/tryout [2]: https://moochee-app.fly.dev [3]: website: https://moochee.fly.dev
stories.title: Show HN: Have fun quiz games with your team
